Primer salida a San Quint√≠n 9:00am.
Salidas a Tj cada media hora y a Mexicali cada 4h.

Review:
Una experiencia sobrevalorada

El restaurante cuenta con una buena imagen, el servicio suele ser atento, sin embargo la comida deja un tanto que desear.

No se dejen enga√±ar, aunque el ‚ÄúRibeye Delmonico‚Äù suene interesante (y aparente ser un mejor corte dado el peso en gramos con el cual se vende), no tiene sabor ni calidad. Y no s√© si fue por los meseros o as√≠ sali√≥ de cocina, pero cuando me fue servido, estaba t√≠bio/fr√≠o.

Los vegetales a la parrilla - aunque carec√≠an de m√°s saz√≥n - eran buena elecci√≥n y ten√≠an tanto buena presentaci√≥n as√≠ como sabor.

Personalmente son m√°s adepto a platillos de sabor m√°s fuerte y caracter√≠stico, sin embargo aqu√≠ falt√≥ ese factor.

Sin duda, un restaurante no apropiado para aquellos que buscan disfrutar un corte de carne - si tu plan es socializar, tal vez sea adecuado para ti.
traduccion_nueva: An overrated experience The restaurant has a good image, the service is usually attentive, however the food leaves something to be desired. Don't be fooled, although ‚ÄúRibeye Delmonico‚Äù sounds interesting (and appears to be a better cut given the weight in grams with which it is sold), it has no flavor or quality. And I don't know if it was because of the waiters or if it came from the kitchen, but when it was served to me, it was warm/cold. The grilled vegetables - although lacking more seasoning - were a good choice and had both good presentation and flavor. Personally, they are more adept at dishes with a stronger and more characteristic flavor, however that factor was lacking here. Review:
En ventanilla el servicio de las cajeras de Scotiabank es muy eficiente, pero la semana pasada que llev√© a mi mam√° (una se√±ora de la tercera edad) a buscar la tarjeta de una cuenta que abrimos v√≠a Internet, estuvimos esperando un poco m√°s de una hora y ninguno de los ejecutivos nos pregunt√≥ que operaci√≥n √≠bamos a hacer.

Normalmente son amables pero ese d√≠a uno de los ejecutivos no estaba, vi que la se√±orita que atiende en el primer cub√≠culo atendi√≥ a otra persona que estaba en la sala de espera. En la oficina de la gerente estaban un se√±or y un joven.

Luego vi que la misma se√±orita del primer cub√≠culo se desocup√≥, pens√© que nos iba a llamar o a preguntar que operaci√≥n √≠bamos a realizar, pero no, ella se fue al cub√≠culo de la gerente y ah√≠ estuvo varios minutos, entonces me levant√© y tuve que interrumpir.

Dije que ten√≠amos mucho tiempo esperando, que si se iban a tardar mucho, creo que la gerente se molest√≥ y contest√≥: "S√≠, me voy a tardar", le pregunt√© y la se√±orita? dirigiendome a la se√±orita del primer cub√≠culo que estaba parada ah√≠ mismo, y la gerente contest√≥: "ella va a salir".

Les dije que para m√≠ era dif√≠cil estar llevando a mi mam√°, que por favor necesitaba que nos atendieran, que s√≥lo √≠bamos por una tarjeta de una cuenta que abrimos por Internet.

Entonces la se√±orita del primer cub√≠culo dijo: "¬øs√≥lo vienen a recoger una tarjeta?" ah, bueno, entonces pasen y as√≠ fue como por fin nos atendi√≥, se tard√≥ alrededor de 10 minutos porque se distrajo con alguien que le llam√≥ y le pidi√≥ algo por tel√©fono.

Esto fue hace varios meses con la gerente anterior, hab√≠a otro personal, lo cambiaron todo! Ahora hay mejor servicio, la nueva gerente s√∫per atenta, siempre disponible (Mayo 2023) hay 3 ejecutivas y me da gusto verlas a todas tan atentas.

Laa cajeras son muy sonrientes y s√∫per amables, una de ellas es m√°s r√°pida y la otra es un poquito lenta y se pone nerviosa, pero debe ser porque es nueva.
traduccion_nueva: At the counter, the Scotiabank ATM service is very efficient, but last week when I took my mother (an elderly lady) to look for the card for an account that we opened online, we were waiting a little over an hour and none of the executives asked us what operation we were going to do. Normally they are friendly but that day one of the executives was not there, I saw that the lady who serves in the first cubicle attended to another person who was in the waiting room. In the manager's office were a man and a young man. Then I saw that the same lady from the first cubicle vacated, I thought she was going to call us or ask what operation we were going to perform, but no, she went to the manager's cubicle and was there for several minutes, then I got up and had to interrupt . I said that we had been waiting for a long time, that they were going to take a long time, I think the manager got upset and answered: "Yes, I'm going to take a while," I asked her and the lady? I turned to the lady in the first cubicle who was standing right there, and the manager answered: "she's going out." I told them that it was difficult for me to be taking my mother, that please I needed them to help us, that we were only going to get a card from an account that we opened online. Then the lady in the first cubicle said, "Are you just coming to pick up a card?" Ah, well, then come in and that's how he finally attended to us, it took about 10 minutes because he was distracted by someone who called him and asked him for something on the phone. This was several months ago with the previous manager, there was other staff, they changed everything! Now there is better service, the new manager is super attentive, always available (May 2023) there are 3 executives and I am happy to see them all so attentive. The cashiers are very smiling and super friendly, one of them is faster and the other is a little slow and gets nervous, but it must be because she is new.

Review: Service was good. I had the Barbacoa which was good, but there was only enough meat in there to make one single taco. The majority of it was just broth. I was still hungry when I went home. The taste was very good, just seems like the kitchen did not pay attention to put the actual barbacoa in the bowl, they were in a hurry maybe. There's a strange odor downstairs, I think it's coming from the sewer so they have that area closed and only upstairs was open. That's not really anything that they can do to control that so I feel a little bad for them. My wife had the steak, the ribeye. She was kind enough to share a little bit with me. I thought the steak was decent. I would like to go back and try the barbacoa one more time ...

La suerte en el CAT es un juego de azar. Si hay suerte la respuesta es r√°pida, amable y eficaz. Si no la hay, se puede esperar en l√≠nea hasta 45 minutos antes de que alguien conteste. traduccion_nueva: This bank in general has declined greatly. Their advisors are terrible, you have to keep chasing them, they don't do their job of guiding the client, or they simply disappear and there is no way to locate them again. Luck in CAT is a game of chance. If you're lucky the response is quick, friendly and efficient. If there isn't, you can wait in line for up to 45 minutes before someone answers. Executives are almost always "very busy" and we have had people with a rather despotic attitude on the other end of the line. They make "improvements" to their system supposedly for security, when the interface of the application that they force you to use is inefficient and insecure. And if the system goes down, a "human person" recommends turning to "Lucy", a virtual assistant via Wapp, as incredible as it may seem. I DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL.

Review: Despu√©s de m√°s de 25 a√±os de haber abierto cuenta finalmente la cerr√©. Hace m√°s de 6 a√±os saque casi todo mi dinero porque la atenci√≥n era deficiente y ofrec√≠an cosas que no cumpl√≠an. Por confiado no cerr√© la cuenta y dej√© cerca de $10,000. Pensando que m√°s adelante podr√≠an ser una opci√≥n. A principio de a√±o revise mi estado y casi toda la inversi√≥n se la hab√≠an comido en comisiones, jam√°s se comunicaron para indicarme cuando empezar√≠an a cobrar comisiones o para decirme que autorizara el pago de nuevas comisiones. Por experiencia sabia que ese era el procedimiento: te hablaban para que fueras a pagar y as√≠ se aseguraban de que estuvieras enterado. A su conveniencia cambiaron esa pol√≠tica para robarse el dinero de miles de clientes. "Acost√∫mbrate a ganar m√°s" es solo  slogan, si conf√≠as en ellos cualquier d√≠a cambian sus pol√≠ticas y procedimientos y  te dejan sin nada. M√°s te vales leer todo su largu√≠simo contrato y entender todo y prevenir todo. Me arrepiento y me disculpo por de haber recomendado esta empresa en el pasado. Al parecer su verdadera vocaci√≥n es que "ellos se acostumbren a ganar m√°s" sin √©tica y sin escr√∫pulos y si el cliente pierde todo pues eso le pasa por confiado.
traduccion_nueva: After more than 25 years of opening an account, I finally closed it. More than 6 years ago I took out almost all my money because the service was poor and they offered things that did not comply. Out of confidence I did not close the account and left about $10,000. Thinking that later they could be an option. At the beginning of the year I reviewed my status and almost all of the investment had been eaten up in commissions. They never contacted me to tell me when they would start charging commissions or to tell me to authorize the payment of new commissions. From experience I knew that this was the procedure: they talked to you so that you would pay and that way they made sure that you were aware. At their convenience they changed that policy to steal the money of thousands of clients. "Get used to earning more" is just a slogan, if you trust them any day they change their policies and procedures and leave you with nothing. You better read their entire very long contract and understand everything and prevent everything. I regret and apologize for recommending this company in the past. Apparently their true vocation is that "they get used to earning more" without ethics and without scruples and if the client loses everything, then that is what they think is trusting.

Review:
Respecto a mi experiencia en Actinver puedo decir unos consejos si vas a visitar la sucursal.

Tienen estacionamiento gratuito para clientes y es por la calle Rinconada de las Praderas en frente del Oxxo solo hay que decir que vienen al banco para que te den tu boleto sellado.

Respecto a la atenci√≥n por ser personalizada ser√° necesario agendar una cita previamente para no quedar esperando, pues todo se maneja de esta manera y quedar√°s esperando si no cuentas con ella, te atender√°n pero ser√° tardado.

Con respecto a los medios de comunicaci√≥n es preferible que contactes a tu asesor por medio de correo o WhatsApp pues la lineas si se encuentran saturadas en ocasiones.

Ya hablando de los productos de inversi√≥n creo que el ser una instituci√≥n regulada la vuelve ser√≠a y comprometida con los clientes pues da la seguridad de tener productos respaldados por el IPAB.

En cuanto a la asesor√≠a, es importante mencionar que se encuentran preparados y brindan muy buen servicio, algunos procesos son lentos pero con paciencia todo se resuelve.

En resumen es un buen lugar para invertir, cuenta con muchos servicios, se debe ser paciente con el servicio telef√≥nico y de preferencia hacer cita para no pasar un mal rato.
traduccion_nueva: Regarding my experience at Actinver, I can say some advice if you are going to visit the branch. They have free parking for clients and it is on Rinconada de las Praderas street in front of the Oxxo, you just have to say that they come to the bank to give you your stamped ticket. Regarding the attention, because it is personalized, it will be necessary to schedule an appointment in advance so as not to be left waiting, since everything is handled in this way and you will be left waiting if you do not have one, they will attend to you but it will take time. Regarding the media, it is preferable that you contact your advisor by email or WhatsApp as the lines are sometimes saturated. Speaking of investment products, I believe that being a regulated institution makes it serious and committed to clients since it gives the security of having products backed by the IPAB. Regarding advice, it is important to mention that they are prepared and provide very good service, some processes are slow but with patience everything is resolved. In short, it is a good place to invest, it has many services, you should be patient with the telephone service and preferably make an appointment so as not to have a bad time.

Review:
¬°EMPLEADOS DE BANCO AZTECA ME CLONARON LA TARJETA Y ME ROBARON 10MIL PESOS!

¬°No conf√≠es en Banco Azteca! Sus mismos empleados clonan las tarjetas que ni siquiera has activado.

En enero se me ocurri√≥ la grandiosa idea de abrir una cuenta con Banco Azteca, ese mismo d√≠a me entregaron una tarjeta de debito en un sobre sellado, el cual nunca abr√≠ ya que no pretend√≠a usar dicha tarjeta. Tampoco activ√© nunca la tarjeta digital en su plataforma. Para lo √∫nico que usaba esa cuenta era para guardar parte de mis ahorros. Resulta que el pasado 29-Jun-2023 se realiz√≥ un cargo en l√≠nea a mi tarjeta de d√©bito (por m√°s de 10mil pesos) para una compra con AVIANCA-MADRID, misma compra que obviamente yo no realic√© ya que ni siquiera conozco la expiraci√≥n ni CCV de mi tarjeta (repito, la tarjeta aun est√° en el sobre sellado que me entregaron en enero). Entonces no entiendo como es posible que alguien haya clonado mi tarjeta si solo ustedes Banco Azteca tienen esos datos sensibles de mi tarjeta. Puse la reclamaci√≥n y la resoluci√≥n fue ‚ÄúNo procedente‚Äù ya que seg√∫n @Banco Azteca fui yo quien us√≥ la tarjeta, cuando es obvio que no fue as√≠. Volv√≠ a poner la reclamaci√≥n y nuevamente recib√≠ la misma resoluci√≥n. Su pol√≠tica de protecci√≥n de datos es ineficaz y se me hace una falta de √©tica por parte de @Banco Azteca el que no hagan nada para devolverme mi dinero. Le√≠ rese√±as en internet y veo que no soy el √∫nico cliente afectado, veo que es muy com√∫n que esto pase con @Banco Azteca, as√≠ que no conf√≠en su dinero con este banco. Cr√©anme que su dinero est√° mas protegido debajo del colch√≥n de su habitaci√≥n que en una cuenta de @Banco Azteca
.
@Banco Azteca ya puse mi reclamaci√≥n en la CONDUSEF porque no voy a dejar que se queden con mi dinero, ustedes son c√≥mplices de los ladrones que trabajan en su banco al no hacer nada para que estos casos no se sigan suscitando.
traduccion_nueva: BANK AZTECA EMPLOYEES CLONED MY CARD AND STOLEN 10 THOUSAND PESOS FROM ME! Don't trust Banco Azteca! Their same employees clone the cards that you have not even activated. In January I had the great idea of opening an account with Banco Azteca, that same day they gave me a debit card in a sealed envelope, which I never opened since I did not intend to use said card. I also never activated the digital card on their platform. The only thing I used that account for was to save part of my savings. It turns out that last June 29, 2023, an online charge was made to my debit card (for more than 10 thousand pesos) for a purchase with AVIANCA-MADRID, the same purchase that I obviously did not make since I do not even know the expiration or CCV of my card (I repeat, the card is still in the sealed envelope they gave me in January). So I don't understand how it is possible that someone has cloned my card if only you Banco Azteca have those sensitive data on my card. I filed the claim and the resolution was ‚ÄúNot applicable‚Äù since according to @Banco Azteca I was the one who used the card, when it is obvious that this was not the case. I filed the claim again and again received the same resolution. Their data protection policy is ineffective and I think it is unethical on the part of @Banco Azteca that they do nothing to return my money. I read reviews on the internet and I see that I am not the only client affected, I see that it is very common for this to happen with @Banco Azteca, so do not trust your money with this bank. Believe me, your money is more protected under the mattress in your room than in a @Banco Azteca account. @Banco Azteca I already filed my claim with CONDUSEF because I am not going to let them keep my money, you are accomplices of the thieves who work at your bank by not doing anything so that these cases do not continue to arise.

P√©sima atenci√≥n desde que llegas, les ped√≠ una car√°tula o algo en formato digital, me dijeron que me lo enviar√≠an y no fue as√≠.
Pregunt√© por aumentar el tope de dep√≥sitos y me manejaron que para aumentar mi l√≠mite de dep√≥sitos ten√≠a que tener un ahorro en d√≥lares  lo cual fue completamente falso, la realidad es que me vendieron un seguro sin mi consentimiento llamado META SEGURA.
Resulta que Meta Segura es un seguro de vida que en caso de que faltes le entregan a tu beneficiario la suma asegurada, en este caso 13,000 USD, para poder recuperar tu dinero si puedes hacerlo antes del plazo que fue de 13 A√ëOS solo que te entregan una parte.

traduccion_nueva: BAD ATTENTION, FRAUD AND DECEPTION Terrible attention from the moment you arrive, I asked them for a cover or something in digital format, they told me they would send it to me and that was not the case. I asked about increasing the deposit limit and they told me that to increase my deposit limit I had to have savings in dollars which was completely false, the reality is that they sold me insurance without my consent called META SEGURA. It turns out that Meta Segura is a life insurance that in case you are missing, they give your beneficiary the insured sum, in this case 13,000 USD, to be able to recover your money if you can do it before the period, which was 13 YEARS, only that they give you a part. In my case I will be able to withdraw 364 USD of the 526 USD that was taken from me and that starting in the seventh month.

Review: QUIZA DEBERIAS TOMAR FOTOS DE EVIDENCIA O VIDEO ANTES DE EMPE√ëAR. Es la √∫nica mala experiencia que he tenido, y espero sea  la ultima, he llevado a empe√±ar ya varios instrumentos y  siempre los tengo en perfecto estado ya que a eso me dedico, dos a√±os despues de no empe√±ar nada esta ultima vez lleve a empe√±ar una guitarra de valor, que aprecio y siempre cuide mucho, solo pedi $600 y fui a recogerla unos d√≠as despues por lo que no la deje en estuche, cuando pague me entregaron la guitarra con un gran golpe en la parte posterior de la caja,raspones, la tapa estaba separada unos 2cm y el golpe despego la madera (con todo y pintura) unos 7cm, al parecer se les cayo del estante donde las colocan, obviamente reclame porque uno deberia recibir sus pertenencias como las dejo e incluso tengo evidencias de como estaba la guitarra antes de empe√±arla, el asunto es que un chico amable llamado Leo me ofrecio una reparaci√≥n (disque con su gerente, aunque nunca hable con el) pero yo se de antemano que son muy caras y ademas un golpe de ese tipo deval√∫a el instrumento, dias despues al recoger mi guitarra me di cuenta del pesimo trabajo pues solo hab√≠an rellenado el hueco y pintado con el esmalte de u√±as mas parecido al color que encontraron, acepte porque no iba a dejarles mi guitarra y menos por lo que me ofrecieron pero sinceramente deber√≠an tener mas cuidado con los art√≠culos de los clientes, en otras ocasiones envuelven mis instrumentos en plastico que hasta dos metros les quito de encima esta vez solo traia 20cm de emplaye y sobre eso su etiqueta para ubicar los articulos, quiero agregar que una se√±ora muy metiche defendia que desde que lleve mi instrumento ya estaba golpeado y ni aunque mostre mis pruebas pude sacarle de su idea, a lo mejor a ella se le cayo porque juraba haber revisado las camaras y dice que nunca le pas√≥ nada al instrumento, que raro porque antes otro empleado con quien trate directamente mi asunto honestamente me dijo que no tuvieron tiempo de ver las camaras, revisen que protegan bien sus articulos
traduccion_nueva: MAYBE YOU SHOULD TAKE PHOTOS OF EVIDENCE OR VIDEO BEFORE PAWNING. It is the only bad experience I have had, and I hope it will be the last, I have had to pawn several instruments and I always have them in perfect condition since that is what I do, two years after not pawning anything this last time I had to pawn one valuable guitar, which I appreciate and always take great care of, I only ordered $600 and I went to pick it up a few days later so I didn't leave it in the case, when I paid they delivered the guitar to me with a big dent on the back of the case, scratches, The lid was separated by about 2cm and the blow detached the wood (with everything and paint) by about 7cm. Apparently it fell from the shelf where they are placed. Obviously I complained because one should receive their belongings as they were left and I even have evidence of how they were. the guitar before pawning it, the thing is that a nice guy named Leo offered me a repair (I talked to his manager, although I never talked to him) but I know in advance that they are very expensive and also a blow of that type devalues the instrument Days later, when I picked up my guitar, I realized what a terrible job it was because they had only filled in the hole and painted it with the nail polish closest to the color they could find. I accepted because I wasn't going to leave my guitar to them, much less for what they offered me, but honestly They should be more careful with the clients' items, on other occasions they wrap my instruments in plastic that I remove up to two meters from them, this time I only had 20cm of packaging and on that their label to locate the items, I want to add that a very lady The nosy person defended that since I brought my instrument it had already been damaged and even if I showed my evidence I couldn't dissuade her from her idea, maybe she dropped it because she swore she had checked the cameras and she says that nothing ever happened to the instrument, how strange because Before, another employee with whom I dealt directly with my matter honestly told me that they did not have time to see the cameras, check that they protect their items well.

Review:
November 4, 2023, I entered to ask if there was anyone working that day that could process my IRA contribution as the last time the banker hand to make a call to tbe walked through the steps.  The greeter/teller (Jocelyn) told me to wait.  I replied that nust wanted a yes or no answer, so she went to find a banker.  The courteous female banker told me yes.  so Iff I went for a cashier's check.
Upon my return, Jocelyn did not say anything.  I did notice, however, that the female banker I had talked to was busy.  So I sat down to wait.  After a t least ten minutes, the branch manager, Gerardo (I think), sent Jocely on a break and covered for her.  After another five or six minutes, I rose and told him that I was there to make an IRA contribution.  He replied raising his voice that I would have to keep waiting because his bankers were busy.  He then asked (still in a raised voice) if I signed in.  I told him that the greeter didn't say anything to me even though she knkew why I was there and that I had been waiting over fifteen minutes.  (I was the only customer waiting ata a cushioned bench-like piede of furniture that was actually facing the wall! )  He snapped back defending his employee instead of whoeing any interest whatsoever in what I had to say.  After a moment, he went to acubicle.  With a smirk, he muttered something to banker Salvador who galcned at me and chuckled before calling me over.  These three demonstrated immuture, unprofessional behavior.  I wrote their Executive Office in Columbus, OH, but only received two letters acknowledging having received my complaint.

Upon my return, Jocelyn did not say anything. I did notice, however, that the female banker I had talked to was busy. So I sat down to wait. After at least ten minutes, the branch manager, Gerardo (I think), sent Jocely on a break and covered for her. Review: $27 for using the foot bridge. $42 for entering the country unless you have Mexican papers. $45 for one carry-on bag.   I realize these are three separate entities but I'm painting the picture that you feel pecked to death.  The airport is alright but kind of disorganized.  I made one line to print the boarding pass, which is a good idea as I saw plenty of people having trouble scanning cell screens.  Line number 2 to buy a CBX pass.  Line number 3  to complete the tourism form. Line number 4 to scan your CBX pass and get onto the bridge. Line number 5 to declare how long you will be in the country and pay your $42. Line number 6 to show your passport and paid tourism fee receipt. Line number 7 to get your luggage scanned by Aduana officers. Line number 8 to pay for luggage and check it in if you're going to check it. Line number 9 to scan your boarding pass and get into the equivalent of TSA. Line number 10 to place your belongings onto the trays and get through weapons screening. Line number 11 to get on the plane.  The only thing that would be worse would be if there were no lines and it was just mayhem. üôÑ I just think the process could be streamlined. One last whine.  You can't find a cold drink in the airport.  Everything is just under room temp.  Oh well.  First world problems here.

I realize these are three separate entities but I'm painting the picture that you feel stuck to death. The airport is alright but kind of disorganized. I made one line to print the boarding pass, which is a good idea as I saw plenty of people having trouble scanning cell screens. Line number 2 to buy a CBX pass. Line number 3 to complete the tourism form. Line number 4 to scan your CBX pass and get onto the bridge. Line number 5 to declare how long you will be in the country and pay your $42. Line number 6 to show your passport and paid tourism fee receipt. Line number 7 to get your luggage scanned by Customs officers. Line number 8 to pay for luggage and check it in if you're going to check it. Line number 9 to scan your boarding pass and get into the equivalent of TSA. Line number 10 to place your belongings onto the trays and get through weapons screening. Line number 11 to get on the plane. The only thing that would be worse would be if there were no lines and it was just mayhem. üôÑ I just think the process could be streamlined. One last whine. You can't find a cold drink in the airport. Everything is just under room temp. Oh well. First world problems here.

Review:
If I could give this branch and the manager a zero, I would.  I saw the 2.5 Rating and thought, Can it really be that bad? The answer is yes.
I needed financial documentation proving income.  They said I could not get 12 months of statements only 3 months.  I asked for the manager because I had received this info before at the Hillcrest branch.  He stated I would have to go online and said this was a Chase policy. Basically he straight up lied to me, because I went to the Imperial Beach branch not too far away and they were very helpful.  The Chula Vista manager was very insincere and fake with his politeness.  Customer service is not his forte.  Plus maybe learn the Chase policies.
Do yourself a favor and go to the Imperial Beach Branch.  It might be further away, but you will save time by NOT standing in a line goes outside the building.

Review:
I'm  a disabled person,and I  bank with Chase for many many years.  I am very disappointed  that there are No disabled parking spots, Not a single space! Not only that but
There is NO ramp or a lower sidewalk  for a person like myself  to go up.  I am in a wheelchair.  I had to step up with my cane and the help of my sister. I also noticed  that the staff from the bank stood and watched.  Not having a ramp or lowered sidewalk  goes against
Citizens with disabilities  act.  I am considering  not doing business  with Chase any longer. If I could post with Zero stars I would.

Review:
Es un buen lugar para invertir tu dinero, actualmente tienes muchas opciones financieras y unos asesores excelentes pero hace unos a√±os tuve la desfortuna de tener un asesor el cual afortunadamente fue despedido ya que no tenia escr√∫pulos pero si comportamientos criminales.

Este ex asesor se llama ANDR√âS ALEJANDRO GLORIA GARCIA , mi primer contacto con √©l fue cuando me enter√© que en un mes gener√≥ una p√©rdida de 37% en mi portafolio por invertirlo todo en acciones de MAXCOM.
Cambi√© el contrato a NO discrecional y descubr√≠ que hac√≠a compra y venta de acciones SIN mi autorizaci√≥n ni la del cotitular.
Incluso quizo transferir m√°s del 50% del dinero a un fondo de otra instituci√≥n financiera llamada FOSTER HILL CAPITAL sin contar con FIRMA NI AUTORIZACI√ìN, aprovechando que en su momento solo se le orden√≥ que transfiriera el 5%.
FOSTER HILL actualmente ya no existe y se llev√≥ todo el dinero de algunos clientes de MONEX que se ganaron la confianza de Andr√©s.
traduccion_nueva: It is a good place to invest your money, currently you have many financial options and excellent advisors but a few years ago I had the misfortune of having an advisor who fortunately was fired since he had no scruples but criminal behavior. This former advisor is called ANDR√âS ALEJANDRO GLORIA GARCIA, my first contact with him was when I found out that in one month he generated a loss of 37% in my portfolio by investing everything in MAXCOM shares. I changed the contract to NON-discretionary and discovered that it was buying and selling shares WITHOUT my authorization or that of the co-owner. He even wanted to transfer more than 50% of the money to a fund of another financial institution called FOSTER HILL CAPITAL without having a SIGNATURE OR AUTHORIZATION, taking advantage of the fact that at the time he was only ordered to transfer 5%. FOSTER HILL currently no longer exists and took all the money of some MONEX clients who gained Andr√©s' trust.

Review:
Es un proyecto muy BUENO, lo malo es que no cuenta con la estructura adecuada, ya que con poco personal y muy poca capacitaci√≥n quiere llevar a cabo una gran RESPONSABILIDAD, d√≥nde NOSOTROS como parte fundamental de este proyecto no nos saben RESPALDAR NI ASESORAR NI GUIAR, se les olvida a los directivos y responsables directos que para SABER GANAR GANAR es B√ÅSICO SABER DEL TEMA, y quedan muy faltos de conocimiento, dejan a su personal de CONTACTO DIRECTO (call Center) muy sueltos y con muy baja asesor√≠a para ayudarnos a resolver las diversas fallas COTIDIANAS Y REPETITIVAS (Como son reales muy poca o muy falta la plataforma que usan que falla demasiado y deja en suspenso y angustia las ventas al no registrarse de inmediato y por consecuencia estar llamando angustiadamente sin respuesta concreta)...  COBROS DE INICIO POR INSCRIPCI√ìN M√ÅS DE 2MIL PESOS SIN RECUPERACI√ìN F√çSICA REAL, COBROS POR COMISI√ìN DEL 4% POR CADA VENTA, COBRO POR MANEJO DE CUENTA, DEP√ìSITOS REFLEJADOS F√çSICO REAL EN LA CUENTA DE MI NEGOCIO HASTA DESPU√âS DE M√çNIMO 24 HRS HASTA 72HRS O M√ÅS, PAGOS QR FALLOS FATALES, TRANFERENCIA FATALES, CITAS FISICAS A SUS OFICINAS (PROVISIONALES EN AREAS DE ESTACIONAMIENTOS O REMOLQUES Y POSTERIORMENTE EN PEQUE√ëOS LOCALES "ADAPTADOS COMO OFICINAS RENTADAS TEMPORALMENTE") SIN SOLUCI√ìN PARA REVISI√ìN Y CAMBIO DE EQUIPOS ELECTR√ìNICOS QUE FALLAN CONSTANTEMENTE... HOY EN D√çA DESPU√âS DE UNA LLAMADA DONDE LA SE√ëORITA QUE ESTA DEL OTRO LADO DE LA L√çNEA TELEF√ìNICA DICE: "YA NO SE PEDIR√ÅN TANTOS REQUISITOS YA QUE SOLO SE TRABAJAR√Å COMO *BANCA M√ìVIL* Y YA NO EXISTEN CARGOS, SOLO QUEREMOS QUE TRABAJEN CON NOSOTROS NUEVAMENTE Y AL ACCEDER SEGUIMOS DENTRO DE EL PROYECTO, PERO SE RETIRARON DEL PRINCIPAL OBJETIVO QUE ERA "QUE EL BENEFICIO SOLO ERA PARA PAPELEROS REGISTRADOS Y VEMOS QUE EN CUALQUIER TIENDA O SUPERMERCADO DE CONVENIENCIA EN AUTOM√ÅTICO PERDEMOS ESE PRIVILEGIO "... HOY ME DESCONCIERTA Y ME PONE EN P√ÅNICO QUE NUEVAMENTE REGRESAMOS AL OR√çGEN DEL PROYECTO PERO CON MAS RECARGOS AHORA PIDEN 6MIL PESOS QUE NO VEO COMO ME LOS RECUPEREN...
NO VEO GANANCIAS PADA MI NEGOCIO, Ahora LO QUE VEO  ES QUE SE OCUPAN PARA ELLOS Y DEJAN DESPROTEGIDOS A NOSOTROS...LES HA FALTADO SER  Congruentes... POR EL MOMENTO DEJO DE LADO EL PERTENECER A SU PROYECTO... ESPEREMOS MAS ADELANTE REALMENTE TRABAJAR EN SU PROYECTO Y REALMENTE GANAR GANAR.
traduccion_nueva: It is a very GOOD project, the bad thing is that it does not have the appropriate structure, since with few personnel and very little training it wants to carry out a great RESPONSIBILITY, where WE as a fundamental part of this project do not know how to SUPPORT OR ADVISE OR GUIDE , managers and direct managers forget that to KNOW HOW TO WIN WIN it is BASIC TO KNOW ABOUT THE ISSUE, and they are left very lacking in knowledge, leaving their DIRECT CONTACT staff (call center) very loose and with very little advice to help us solve the various EVERYDAY AND REPETITIVE failures (As they are real, there is very little or very little lack of the platform they use that fails too much and leaves sales in suspense and distress by not registering immediately and consequently calling anxiously without a concrete answer)... START BY REGISTRATION MORE THAN 2 THOUSAND PESOS WITHOUT REAL PHYSICAL RECOVERY, COMMISSION CHARGES OF 4% FOR EACH SALE, ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT CHARGE, REAL PHYSICAL DEPOSITS REFLECTED IN MY BUSINESS ACCOUNT UNTIL AFTER MINIMUM 24 HRS UP TO 72 HRS OR MORE, PAYMENTS QR FATAL FAILURES, FATAL TRANSFERS, PHYSICAL APPOINTMENTS TO THEIR OFFICES (PROVISIONAL IN PARKING OR TRAILER AREAS AND LATER IN SMALL PREMISES "ADAPTED AS TEMPORARILY RENTED OFFICES") WITHOUT SOLUTION FOR REVIEW AND CHANGE OF ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT THAT CONSTANTLY FAILS... TODAY IN DAY AFTER A CALL WHERE THE LADY ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE PHONE LINE SAYS: "SO MANY REQUIREMENTS WILL NO LONGER BE REQUESTED SINCE WE WILL ONLY WORK AS *MOBILE BANKING* AND THERE ARE NO LONGER CHARGES, WE ONLY WANT YOU TO WORK WITH US AGAIN AND WHEN ACCESSING WE WERE STILL WITHIN THE PROJECT, BUT THEY WITHDRAWN FROM THE MAIN OBJECTIVE WHICH WAS "THAT THE BENEFIT WAS ONLY FOR REGISTERED STATIONERS AND WE SEE THAT IN ANY AUTOMATIC CONVENIENCE STORE OR SUPERMARKET WE LOSE THAT PRIVILEGE"... TODAY IT CONFUSES ME AND MAKES ME IN PANIC THAT AGAIN WE RETURNED TO THE ORIGIN OF THE PROJECT BUT WITH MORE SURCHARGES NOW THEY ASK FOR 6 THOUSAND PESOS WHICH I DON'T SEE HOW THEY WILL RECOVER THEM... I DON'T SEE PROFITS FOR MY BUSINESS, NOW WHAT I SEE IS THAT THEY TAKE CARE OF IT FOR THEM AND LEAVE US UNPROTECTED. ..THEY HAVE FAILED TO BE CONSISTENT... FOR THE MOMENT I LET GO OF BELONGING TO THEIR PROJECT... WE HOPE LATER TO REALLY WORK ON THEIR PROJECT AND REALLY WIN WIN.

Review:
El d√≠a de hoy acud√≠ a esta sucursal para realizar un dep√≥sito en efectivo, al llegar y antes de poder generar un turno para pasar a caja  me intercepto un asistente quien me pregunt√≥ que servicio requer√≠a , le indique que quer√≠a hacer un dep√≥sito y me indico que este deber√≠a realizarse en el cajero autom√°tico , le pregunt√© por qu√© raz√≥n y me dijo que en caja solo se aceptaban deposito mayores a $ 25,000.000 ,la verdad le dije que estaba mal , que iba a sacar un turno y me.tenian que atender , se dio la vuelta y se alejo , segu√≠ con mi intento de sacar el turno y una cajera , despu√©s me di que era que era una de 3 cajeras  que estaba sin ning√∫n cliente en ventanilla , se acerco y me pregunt√≥ que operaci√≥n iba a realizar , le repet√≠ la informaci√≥n y me dijo que no me iban a atender en caja por la misma raz√≥n , ni hablar , perd√≥n pero la ignore y espere a mi turno , me acerque a una caja y realice el dep√≥sito de $ 6,520.50  sin mayor problema , me dirig√≠ al primer asistente y le ped√≠ su nombre , Antonio Mart√≠nez, de mala gana , me dijo y le pregunt√© el nombre de la cajera y me contest√≥, preg√∫ntele usted , ante tanta cordialidad, acud√≠a la gerencia y manifeste mi desacuerdo con los procedimientos policiales del banco , pero , sorpresa , la gerente me indico que efectivamente esa es la nueva pol√≠tica de la empresa , a caja solo depositos a partir de $25,0000.00.
El problema con esta pol√≠tica es que solo hay un cajero para realizar este tipo de operaciones solo con billetes  y al menos en mi caso ya van 3 veces que se bloquea el aparato y he tenido que hacer el engorroso tr√°mite de reclamaci√≥n o hacer los dep√≥sitos en pausas porque no reconoce los billetes o simplemente no funciona.....mientras tanto adentro hay 3 cajeras , un asistente en el acceso para bloquear el servicio ....todos sea por " no trabajar , ser incompetentes , negligentes  " ...no entiendo o cu√°l es la raz√≥n ...ojala corrijan... Saludos
traduccion_nueva: Today I went to this branch to make a cash deposit, upon arrival and before I could make an appointment to go to the cashier, an assistant intercepted me who asked me what service I required, I told him that I wanted to make a deposit and he told me that This should be done at the ATM, I asked him why and he told me that only deposits greater than $25,000,000 were accepted at the cashier. The truth is, I told him that it was wrong, that I was going to make an appointment and they had to attend to me. He turned around and walked away, I continued with my attempt to get the shift and a cashier, then I realized that she was one of 3 cashiers who were without any customers at the window, she approached me and asked me what operation I was going to perform, I repeated the information and he told me that they were not going to serve me at the cashier for the same reason, not to mention, sorry but I ignored it and waited for my turn, I approached a cashier and made the deposit of $6,520.50 without any major problem, I went to to the first assistant and I asked him for his name, Antonio Mart√≠nez, reluctantly, he told me and I asked him the name of the teller and he answered, you ask him, in the face of so much cordiality, the management came and expressed my disagreement with the bank's police procedures But, surprise, the manager told me that this is indeed the company's new policy, to cash only deposits of $25,0000.00 or more. The problem with this policy is that there is only one ATM to carry out this type of operations only with bills and at least in my case the device has been blocked 3 times and I have had to do the cumbersome claim procedure or make deposits in pauses because it does not recognize the bills or it simply does not work.....meanwhile inside there are 3 cashiers, an assistant at the access to block the service....all of them for "not working, being incompetent, negligent"... I don't understand or what the reason is... I hope they correct it... Greetings

The executive began to yell in front of all the customers that they were not taking care of the cashier in a very rude manner without even knowing what was happening or having asked the customer. Minimo could guide the client on what to do without being hostile, but they had no respect for the client, in general all the executives were noticeable with that type of behavior, even making bad faces and the worst thing is that they didn't even know What was the client's problem when he had already embarrassed her. fui hoy a sacar dinero en el hsbc de ahi mismo  del calimax y no funcionaba el cajero como ocupaba el dinero me pase santander y puse mi nip de ahi la cantidad 2400 y me desia 28 de comision entonces  le puse que continuar y me aparecio un mensaje de error de comunicacion pero en ningun momento me dio el dinero solo
saco mi tarjeta dije alo mejor es un error  de la tarjeta o de los cajeros

el caso es que me fui pase ala casa de un amigo para que me prestara su cel al checar el saldo me aparecian los 2428 como si si me los hubiera dado alguien que me diga que puedo hacer ya levante una queja en hsbc pero se podra pedir las grabaciones en el calimax para llevarlas al banco alguien  ke le aya pasado algo similar que me diga si pudo resolver y le regresaron el dinero

I passed Santander and put my PIN number there and the amount was 2400 and it gave me 28 commission so I asked it to continue and a message appeared communication error but at no time did he give me the money I just took out my card I said maybe it was an error with the card or the ATMs since I didn't see a solution and I didn't have a cell phone to check my balance if it was full I went to the oxxo to want I tried to withdraw at the cashier and it wouldn't let me say declined. The fact is that I went to a friend's house so he could lend me his cell phone. When I checked the balance, the 2428 appeared as if someone had given it to me and told me what I can do. I already filed a complaint with HSBC but you could ask for the recordings in the Calimax to take them to the bank. Someone who has had something similar happen to them can tell me if they were able to resolve it and get the money back.

Review:
Los trabajadores no tienen profesionalidad, te ven sentado esperando y se van a su hora de comida sin haber atendido a los clientes. A todos mis compa√±eros estudiantes mejor saquen su tarjeta en BBVA, los beneficios de santander son un chiste y lo √∫nico que pueden esperar de ellos es la atenci√≥n a cliente mas deficiente que puedan experimentar y horas de espera o d√≠as, o a√±os como en mi caso.
Hace 4 a√±os intente sacar mi tarjeta de debito de estudiante y adivinen que, sigo intentando ir a que me ayuden a activar mi cuenta. Ya me estoy haciendo a la idea de graduarme antes de que me puedan ayudar con la tarjeta. Se me hace una falta de respeto que jueguen con el tiempo de los estudiantes cuando ya tenemos nuestro tiempo tan limitado. Se me hace incre√≠ble que no los monitoreen o que no este un gerente atento a que se lleven a cabo las actividades. Intento marcar para quejarme y necesito un plan para llamadas a larga distancia. En general es un chiste este banco en todos los aspectos. No les conf√≠en ni un peso de su dinero, compa√±eros. Y sobre todo, no pierdan su tiempo intentando hacer tramites o cualquier proceso con ellos, busquen otro banco.
traduccion_nueva: The workers are unprofessional, they see you sitting waiting and leave at their lunch break without having served the customers. To all my fellow students, get your card at BBVA, Santander's benefits are a joke and the only thing you can expect from them is the poorest customer service you can experience and waiting hours or days, or years as in my case . 4 years ago I tried to get my student debit card and guess what, I'm still trying to get help activating my account. I'm already getting used to the idea of graduating before they can help me with the card. I find it disrespectful that they play with the students' time when we already have our time so limited. It seems incredible to me that they are not monitored or that a manager is not attentive to ensuring that the activities are carried out. I'm trying to dial to complain and need a long distance calling plan. In general, this bank is a joke in all aspects. Don't trust them with a single peso of your money, friends. And above all, do not waste your time trying to do paperwork or any process with them, look for another bank.

Review:
A pesar de que no me siento c√≥modo compartiendo mis opiniones, creo que es necesario hacerlo en esta ocasi√≥n. A lo largo de mi vida, he visitado numerosas sucursales bancarias, y lamentablemente, me veo en la obligaci√≥n de advertir a otros sobre mi experiencia en esta sucursal en particular.

No recomendar√≠a visitar esta sucursal. El servicio al cliente que experiment√© aqu√≠ es, sin lugar a dudas, uno de los peores que he encontrado en un banco.

El personal, en su mayor√≠a, se mostr√≥ grosero. No entrar√© en detalles personales, pero no calificar√≠a este lugar con una sola estrella debido a que los ejecutivos fueron la excepci√≥n, trat√°ndonos con amabilidad a m√≠ y a otros clientes, a diferencia del resto del personal que, lamentablemente, se mostraba confrontativo y poco dispuesto a ayudar.

Entiendo que trabajar en un banco puede ser estresante, pero lo que los empleados parecen pasar por alto es que nosotros, como clientes, tambi√©n tenemos nuestras preocupaciones y estr√©s. Lo √∫ltimo que deseamos es discutir con el personal del banco. Esto solo resulta en una p√©rdida de tiempo valioso que podr√≠amos invertir en descansar en casa con nuestra familia, en lugar de enfrentar faltas de respeto por parte del personal.

Sin embargo, no pretendo generalizar sobre el banco Santander en su totalidad. Reconozco que todos los bancos tienen sus puntos fuertes y d√©biles. El problema aqu√≠ es esta sucursal en particular, est√° da√±ando significativamente la reputaci√≥n de Santander y sus servicios. Si pudiera dar un consejo, evitar√≠a esta sucursal a menos que sea absolutamente necesario. Existen otras opciones disponibles, y quiz√°s sea mejor considerarlas antes de recurrir a este lugar.

Por √∫ltimo, quisiera dirigirme a los responsables de esta sucursal. Les insto amablemente a tomar medidas con respecto a la actitud de sus empleados, con la esperanza de que otros no tengan que pasar por lo mismo que experiment√©. Les deseo a todos lo mejor.
traduccion_nueva: Even though I don't feel comfortable sharing my opinions, I think it is necessary to do so on this occasion. Throughout my life, I have visited numerous bank branches, and unfortunately, I feel compelled to warn others about my experience at this particular branch. I would not recommend visiting this branch. The customer service I experienced here is, without a doubt, some of the worst I have encountered at a bank. The staff, for the most part, were rude. I won't go into personal details, but I wouldn't rate this place with a single star because the executives were the exception, treating me and other customers with kindness, unlike the rest of the staff who, unfortunately, were confrontational and unwilling to talk. help. I understand that working in a bank can be stressful, but what employees seem to overlook is that we, as customers, have our worries and stress too. The last thing we want is to argue with bank staff. This only results in a loss of valuable time that we could invest in resting at home with our family, instead of facing disrespect from the staff. However, I do not intend to generalize about Santander Bank as a whole. I recognize that all banks have their strengths and weaknesses. The problem here is this particular branch, it is significantly damaging the reputation of Santander and its services. If I could give one piece of advice, I would avoid this branch unless absolutely necessary. There are other options available, and it may be best to consider them before resorting to this location. Finally, I would like to address those responsible for this branch. I kindly urge you to take action regarding the attitude of your employees, in the hopes that others do not have to go through what I experienced. I wish you all the best.

traduccion_nueva: There is a comment with 5 stars about "people only write when they have bad experiences" But I have been a Santander customer on 3 occasions hoping this will be the last because: There is only 1 executive attending all day, if at the desk of another's photo comment they only take turns. traduccion_nueva: Personally, I read many negative comments regarding this branch and I came - like many others - predisposed. I went at 9am and finished the payroll process at 10:36am. However, I had a problem with my accounts and they kindly and patiently resolved it, explained the details and even provided me with options to resolve it. Later I opened a credit card (Iv√°n assisted me) where they were very clear, they helped me with the process and I left completely satisfied. This took me about 30-45 more minutes. And in the end I canceled two debit cards, I changed my contact cell phone number and email that I had and was not using and they assisted me quickly, efficiently, willingly, patiently and very kind throughout the entire process, that took me about 30 minutes. Although the service is slow due to the few staff they have, fortunately those who work there are the best staff I have had the pleasure of being served by in any Santander branch. I did a lot of procedures and they helped me at all times, it took two and a half hours but I think it is reasonable for the amount of procedures I did. Thank you

Then he goes to his mini desk and writes down that information in a notebook!!!!! He asked me to show my check, he reviewed it and communicated out loud what he was going to collect (thank goodness it was for credit into the account) otherwise I would probably be attacked leaving. Continuing....obviously as time goes by people get desperate and ask when they can get in, to which she responds "if you want to get in quickly you have to pay more and become a Select customer" which we see as unfair because we are already customers and not we didn't even get a turn. To finish, the super slow cashiers, all poorly faced. Even the cleaning lady looks angry at the world (and she's not even Santander staff). But yes, the hostess lying on the mini entrance desk. In particular, I will never return to that branch in my life and I am considering staying with BBVA only because although they always have too many customers, the service is very friendly and efficient.

I hope you can help us resolve this situation, because it is practically a robbery.

Review:
PESIMO SERVICIO

Parece ser que las personas que trabajan all√≠ no entienden que estan ah√≠ para resolver problemas, pues en lugar de ayudar tienden a dirigir a los clientes hacia la l√≠nea de atenci√≥n telef√≥nica.

Si decides visitar la sucursal, aunque sea para hacer una pregunta sencilla, no esperes una respuesta r√°pida. Es muy probable que termines perdiendo una o dos horas de tu d√≠a esperando sin obtener respuesta.

Lamentablemente, llamar por tel√©fono tampoco parece ser una alternativa mejor, ya que en muchos casos simplemente no atienden la llamada. Si logras hablar con alguien, te dirigir√°n a otro departamento donde es probable que tampoco obtengas respuestas claras.

En resumen, el personal solo se pasa la bolita unos a otros, lo cual es demasiado molesto, pues tienen horarios muy limitados de atenci√≥n como para estar perdiendo el tiempo...

Abren a las 9am, cierran a las 4 pm y durante el horario de comida se desaparece casi la mitad del personal que de entrada es muy poca gente.

Deben poner mucha m√°s atenci√≥n.
traduccion_nueva: POOR SERVICE It seems that the people who work there do not understand that they are there to solve problems, because instead of helping they tend to direct customers to the hotline. If you decide to visit the branch, even to ask a simple question, don't expect a quick response. You will most likely end up wasting an hour or two of your day waiting without getting a response. Unfortunately, calling by phone does not seem to be a better alternative either, since in many cases they simply do not answer the call. Review:
Como cliente de la tienda comercial Coppel ubicada en la sucursal Ju√°rez, al costado de la estaci√≥n de Plaza Universidad en Guadalajara, Jalisco, M√©xico, mi experiencia fue realmente conveniente y agradable.

Desde el momento en que entr√© en la tienda, me recibi√≥ un ambiente acogedor y bien organizado. La disposici√≥n ordenada de los productos y la iluminaci√≥n adecuada crearon una atm√≥sfera agradable para explorar los diferentes departamentos y secciones.

Lo primero que not√© fue la amplia variedad de productos disponibles. Desde ropa y calzado hasta electr√≥nicos y art√≠culos para el hogar, la tienda Coppel en esta sucursal parece tener todo lo que uno podr√≠a necesitar. Adem√°s, la gama de marcas y opciones dentro de cada categor√≠a brinda a los clientes una gran flexibilidad para elegir lo que mejor se adapte a sus gustos y necesidades.

El personal de la tienda demostr√≥ ser amable y dispuesto a ayudar. Si ten√≠a preguntas sobre un producto en particular o necesitaba asistencia para encontrar algo, siempre hab√≠a alguien disponible para brindar orientaci√≥n. Esta disposici√≥n a ayudar cre√≥ un ambiente c√≥modo y sin estr√©s para mi experiencia de compra.

La sucursal en s√≠ estaba limpia y bien mantenida, lo que contribuy√≥ a la sensaci√≥n general de profesionalismo y atenci√≥n al detalle. Los letreros y se√±alizaciones claras facilitaron la navegaci√≥n por la tienda, y la disposici√≥n de las cajas registradoras y las √°reas de servicio al cliente estaba dise√±ada de manera l√≥gica.

Adem√°s, la ubicaci√≥n de la tienda, al costado de la estaci√≥n de Plaza Universidad, agreg√≥ un elemento de conveniencia. Fue f√°cil llegar en transporte p√∫blico y, al estar cerca de una estaci√≥n de tren, pude continuar con mi d√≠a sin problemas despu√©s de hacer mis compras.

En general, mi experiencia como cliente en la tienda Coppel sucursal Ju√°rez fue positiva. traduccion_nueva: As a customer of the Coppel commercial store located in the Ju√°rez branch, next to the Plaza Universidad station in Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico, my experience was really convenient and pleasant. From the moment I entered the store, I was greeted by a welcoming and well-organized atmosphere. The orderly arrangement of products and adequate lighting created a pleasant atmosphere to explore the different departments and sections. The first thing I noticed was the wide variety of products available. From clothing and shoes to electronics and home goods, the Coppel store at this branch seems to have everything one could need. Additionally, the range of brands and options within each category gives customers great flexibility to choose what best suits their tastes and needs. The store staff proved to be friendly and willing to help. If I had questions about a particular product or needed assistance finding something, there was always someone available to provide guidance. This willingness to help created a comfortable and stress-free environment for my shopping experience. The branch itself was clean and well maintained, which added to the overall feeling of professionalism and attention to detail. Clear signs and signage made the store easy to navigate, and the layout of the cash registers and customer service areas was logically laid out. Additionally, the store's location, next to the Plaza Universidad station, added an element of convenience. It was easy to get to by public transport and being close to a train station, I was able to continue with my day without problems after doing my shopping. In general, my experience as a customer at the Coppel Ju√°rez branch store was positive. The wide product selection, friendly staff, and convenient location all contributed to a satisfying shopping experience. As a customer, I felt cared for and valued, and would definitely consider returning in the future.

Dios mio yo quiero conocerle y por su puesto que el me venda el equipo que cubra mis requerimientos bueno me dicen que no lo conocen que no saben le expongo todo el tema anteriormente comentado y su respuesta es pido hablar con gerencia y me dan como respuesta que no hay  en turno que alguien m√°s me atienda ,y la verdad no quiero a alguien mas solo quiero disfrutar la experiencia que mi amigo facinado quedo .entiendo que tal vez no sea directamente personal de coppel hay procesos para contratar personal y un n√∫mero de referencia deben tener  pido me apoyen y hagan llegar mis comentarios  a quien si me de informaci√≥n de Jes√∫s de la marca Oppo. traduccion_nueva: Today I arrived at this store because a couple of months ago a friend purchased a cell phone and although I was able to make the purchase this time by some other means or in another store, I wanted to corroborate my friend's experience but I took one surprise since I could not acquire or rather did not want to acquire the telephone, that is to say, I arrived with the intention of finding the person who assisted my young friend whom he described to me with competent knowledge of what he is talking about and the subject, in short, with potential. . I entered the store today and noticed that everyone is on their topic. I approached and asked for Jes√∫s, the Oppo brand. He attended to my friend. My friend is an American who lives in Mexico for work reasons. He doesn't speak Spanish very well other than his native language and I find it amazing that among so many staff this guy is the only one who could give him information about the team and memorable treatment. My God, I want to meet him and of course he should sell me the equipment that meets my requirements. Well, they tell me that they don't know him, that they don't know. I explain the whole topic mentioned above and their response is, I ask to speak with management and they give me the answer: There is no one else on duty to attend to me, and the truth is I don't want anyone else, I just want to enjoy the experience that my fascinated friend had. I understand that it may not be directly Coppel staff, there are processes to hire staff and a reference number must be provided. I ask you to support me and send my comments to whoever can give me information about Jes√∫s from the Oppo brand. For your attention, thank you very much.

Review:
Pues hace un mes compre una moto a contado y en efectivo. Blanca la vendedora de piso fue muy gentil y atenta. Pero lo que fue su gerente dejenme decirles que era un mamador de primera. Probablemente yo gano mucho mas que ese prro pero aun asi se sentia super inmamable por ser gerente de un coppel. El wuey ni nos dirigia la mirada ni mucho menos una palabra. Nada. Aparte de eso, asi como llegue pedi la moto pero me la entregaron 4 horas despues. siempre que les preguntaba que onda con mi moto me decian que ya en 15 minutos la bajaban y nada.Y que creen? Mal armada. Fue un mega pedo con la marca para que me dieran una moto manejable y entrara en garantia

Fue mi error porque era primerizo en eso de comprar una moto y la neta no debi haber ido ahi ya que no necesite su credito.

Eviten comprar motos ahi a menos que en realidad necesiten el credito.
traduccion_nueva: Well, a month ago I bought a motorcycle for cash. Blanca, the floor salesperson, was very kind and attentive. But what his manager was, let me tell you, he was a first-class cocksucker. I probably earn a lot more than that guy but he still felt super unlovable for being a coppel manager. The wuey didn't even look at us, much less say a word. Nothing. Apart from that, as soon as I arrived I ordered the motorcycle but they delivered it to me 4 hours later. Every time I asked them what was up with my motorcycle they told me that in 15 minutes they would take it down and nothing. And what do you think? Poorly armed. It was a big deal with the brand so that they would give me a bike that was manageable and came under warranty. It was my mistake because I was a first-timer at buying a motorcycle and I really shouldn't have gone there since I didn't need the credit. Avoid buying motorcycles there unless you really need the credit.

traduccion_nueva: Yesterday, February 3, 2024, I went to deposit some $ to my debit card but the cashier did not receive it because she said that my account was blocked, so I went to the customer service area and an executive said that it was not possible to unblock the account, what's more - he told me - his account is canceled and the only thing he can do is withdraw his balance and reopen another account with us. traduccion_nueva: I went to the branch today with my family and they had problems with the system so it was taking a long time to get paid and it was already 7:00pm, so they gave us a turn (very reluctantly) to pay at the cash registers. subscription, when our turn arrived, Miss Emilia, who at that time was in box 10 (who was not doing anything), greeted us in a very rude manner and in front of us began to complain to her colleagues on the sides about the work, He started to scan the products and there was a failure in the system so what he had scanned was deleted (4 to 5 items of clothing) and super annoying and arrogant, almost throwing things at us, he again asked us to pass them to him 1 at a time "because he didn't have space) while he was complaining again to his colleagues, when he was about to finish they said over loudspeakers that they were going to close the store and his reaction was to say "Finally", when he gave us the purchases he didn't close them correctly and the card he practically didn't throw it at all. Una se√±ora que tambi√©n estaba comprando estaba quej√°ndose por qu√© no encontraba el par del zapato que ella quer√≠a; el empleado dijo que tal vez ya se lo Hab√≠an ROBADO ya que TODOS LOS D√çAS SE ROBAN art√≠culos esto debido al exceso de gente que hay ah√≠ y la falta de personal, claro.
Hab√≠a otra trabajadora que estaba barriendo arrasando con las cajas que estaban en el suelo, el gerente se paseaba por los pasillos con cara de desesperaci√≥n, osea todo fue un caos la final me atend√≠ yo misma sal√≠ de ah√≠ como 8 de la noche y entre desde la 2 de la tarde LO PEOR NO ACABA AQUI, al salir del lugar ya no estaba el guardia de seguridad que me dijo que revisar√≠a las bolsas, solo estaba una persona de intedencia sacando la basura del bote de afuera de la salida principal, SALIMOS SIN QUE NOS REVISARAN LAS BOLSAS NI NADA NI TICKET DE COMPRA NI NADA, EN ESE MOMENTO ENTENDI POR QUE ES QUE COMENTO EL EMPLEADO QUE ROBAN!!!!  OJALA EL DUE√ëO DEL ESTABLECIMIENTO PUEDA MEJORAR LA ATENCION A CLIENTE Y LA SEGURIDAD PUES SI YO SALI ASI DE LA NADA CUALQUIER MALIANTE LO HARA TAMBIEN. No creo que el lugar sea malo CREO MAS BIEN QUE ES FALTA DE PERSONAL Y DE CAPACITACI√ìN A LA GENTE, TAMBIEN HAY QUE REFORZAR temas de inventario y existencia, y sobre todo la SEGURIDAD.
traduccion_nueva: I went to buy some tennis shoes for my son and a pair for my mother, when I entered the security guard DID NOT CHECK the bags, the lockers were full and there were too many people, the guard commented that when we left they would check our bags (NOTE: THIS IS IMPORTANT AT THE END I EXPLAIN WHY). The entire store was disorganized, shoes scattered everywhere, some tennis shoes did not have their pair nor were they in their boxes. THERE WAS NO STAFF to give attention, and I definitely could not find what I was looking for, there were no sizes in stock of the models I wanted. I wanted it for my son, not to mention the lady's area that was even more messy. There was a worker who kindly helped me as best he could while I tried to clean up the mess. The place was full of people taking out shoes and not putting them where they should. A woman who was also shopping was complaining why she couldn't find the pair of shoes she wanted; The employee said that maybe it had already been STOLEN since items are stolen EVERY DAY, this is due to the excess of people there and the lack of staff, of course. There was another worker who was sweeping, destroying the boxes that were on the floor, the manager was walking through the hallways with a desperate look, I mean everything was chaos, in the end I took care of myself, I left there around 8 at night and entered from at 2 in the afternoon THE WORST DOES NOT END HERE, when I left the place the security guard who told me he would check the bags was no longer there, there was only a person from the administration taking the garbage out of the can outside the main exit, WE LEFT WITHOUT THAT THEY WILL CHECK OUR BAGS OR ANYTHING OR PURCHASE TICKET OR ANYTHING, AT THAT MOMENT I UNDERSTAND WHY THE EMPLOYEE COMMENTED THAT THEY STEAL!!!! I HOPEFULLY THE OWNER OF THE ESTABLISHMENT CAN IMPROVE CUSTOMER SERVICE AND SECURITY BECAUSE IF I COME OUT OF NOWHERE LIKE THIS, ANY CRIMINAL WILL DO IT TOO. I don't think the place is bad, I RATHER THINK IT IS LACK OF STAFF AND TRAINING FOR PEOPLE, WE ALSO NEED TO REINFORCE issues of inventory and existence, and above all SECURITY.

Review:
Mi experiencia en Coppel Plaza Las Am√©ricas en Canc√∫n fue decepcionante, lo que me lleva a otorgar una estrella en mi rese√±a. La mala atenci√≥n y la actitud prepotente de los empleados dejaron mucho que desear.

traduccion_nueva: My experience at Coppel Plaza Las Am√©ricas in Cancun was disappointing, which leads me to award one star in my review. The poor service and arrogant attitude of the employees left much to be desired. From the moment I entered the store, I noticed a lack of interest on the part of the staff in serving customers. I expected assistance in finding what I needed, but I encountered employees who seemed more interested in chatting with each other than helping shoppers. When I finally managed to get the attention of one of them, his overbearing attitude and condescending tone were evident. Instead of answering my questions in a friendly and polite manner, they made me feel like I was intruding and my presence was unwelcome. Additionally, I noticed a lack of knowledge about the products they supported. When I asked for additional information about a particular item, the employee was unable to provide basic details and seemed to be improvising unsubstantiated answers. Review: El d√≠a de hoy fu√≠ a pagar $99 cuando la cajera vi√≥ que pagar√≠a con $500 me dijo no tengo cambio, entonces le pagu√© con un billete de $100 y me dijo muy grosera que no tengo cambio, c√≥mo ya me estaba hablando muy grosera le dije "pues deber√≠as tener" y me dijo muy enojada "deme un peso para darle 5" y se lo di, en la mano as√≠ c√≥mo anteriormente le di el billete en la mano, y ella me avent√≥ los 5 pesos en el mostrador, y le dije "me das tu nombre por favor" y le hablo al gerente (me dijo llamarse Javier Medina" y le grit√≥ "est√° se√±ora me quiere reportar porque no tengo cambio" y le dije -no, no te voy a reportar por el cambio, te voy a reportar porque eres una grosera- apenas le iba a explicar lo sucedido al gerente, cuando me interrumpi√≥ y me dice "yo lo veo con ella" nuevamente intent√© explicarle ya que solo escucho la versi√≥n de la chica" y me volvi√≥ a decir ---yo lo veo con ella-- no es posible que est√° chica me trate tan mal y para colmo m√≠ siquiera reciba una represalia, y deber√≠an capacitar al gerente para que sepa c√≥mo tratar a clientes molestos, ya que no supo manejar la situaci√≥n, no es una persona preparada.
traduccion_nueva: Today I went to pay $99 when the cashier saw that I would pay with $500 and she told me I don't have change, so I paid her with a $100 bill and she told me very rudely that I don't have change, since she was already talking to me very rudely I told her " well you should have it" and she told me very angry "give me a peso to give you 5" and I gave it to her, in my hand just as I previously gave her the bill in my hand, and she threw the 5 pesos at me on the counter, and I told her "give me your name please" and I spoke to the manager (he told me his name was Javier Medina) and he yelled at him "this lady wants to report me because I don't have change" and I told him -no, I'm not going to report you for the change, I I'm going to report it because you're rude - I was barely going to explain what happened to the manager, when he interrupted me and told me "I see it with her" again I tried to explain since I only hear the girl's version" and he told me again - --I see it with her-- it is not possible that this girl treats me so badly and to make matters worse I even receive retaliation, and they should train the manager so that he knows how to deal with annoying customers, since he did not know how to handle the situation, He is not a prepared person.

First, be honest and ethical .. don‚Äôt tell me to open a new account when your promo said new OR ‚Äúexisting‚Äù, secondly ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know..‚Äù should never be coming out of a service person even if you don‚Äôt know.  I made an appointment to add myself to my mother account to help her with her banking needs.  Unfortunately they cannot add me bc they have my Maiden name on their file which was 20+ years ago.  There were NO SOLUTIONS other than I‚Äôm sorry you‚Äôll need to bring proof that you changed your name.  I guess MY LEGAL DRIVER LICESE AND MY LEGAL BANK CARDS FROM MAJOR BANKS aren‚Äôt enough. First, be honest and ethical .. don't tell me to open a new account when your promo said new OR ‚Äúexisting‚Äù, secondly ‚ÄúI don't know..‚Äù should never be coming out of a service person even if you don't know. traduccion_nueva: Awful. Exactly what Melissa Teruel said. I went to pay off a car loan and they told me that the invoice would be on a Monday. If they don't give me an answer I will have to do the same. And I invite those who have something similar to make a claim, so they can resolve it for you.

Review:

El servicio por parte de las meseras es un poco lento, al inicio nos atienden para que pidamos pronto, despu√©s tardan en pasar para saber si no te hace falta algo, yo creo que es para que no comas mucho del buffet, puede ser tambi√©n porque no hay meseras suficientes, hab√≠a solo tres meseras y no se daban abasto, eso que no hab√≠a mucha gente pero ya comenzaban a llegar mas clientes.
La comida no es tan buena, la hamburguesa con carne tipo Aurrera, de esa congelada, las alitas regulares con poco aderezo pero bastas, seg√∫n al principio eran 10 y solo me dieron 7, las siguientes te dan de 5 en 5. Los nachos ni los pidan, muy sosos y con muy poco queso, poco frijol, poca salsa.

traduccion_nueva: The place is average, the atmosphere in terms of music is calm, perhaps because of the time I went at 3:00 pm, so it was good to be able to chat, maybe later at the time of the music in alive it turns on more, which is understandable. The service from the waitresses is a little slow, at first they serve us so that we order quickly, then they take a while to come by to know if you don't need something, I think it's so that you don't eat too much of the buffet, it could also be because There are not enough waitresses, there were only three waitresses and they couldn't cope, there weren't many people but more customers were beginning to arrive. In general, if they improve customer service, the waitresses are more organized and take care of their customers, the wings are better seasoned, the burger has better meat or better flavor, then it would be a place that I would frequent more often.

Pedimos el buffet y no nos avisaron que no hab√≠a sushi hasta que ya hab√≠amos pedido las alitas.

Al pagar la cuenta, c√≠nicamente pidi√≥ que se le diera el 10% correspondiente a la propina la cu√°l no es obligatorio pagarla. La m√∫sica no te deja hablar con las personas, tienes que gritar o subir el tono de voz. S√≠ tienen la oportunidad de ir, desaprovechenla. No lo recomiendo en lo m√°s m√≠nimo.

Review:
Yo he ido nada m√°s por el buffet. Hay valet parking, aunque en si hay pocos espacios para estacionarse cerca, hay varios en la esquina pero es San Manuel.

Te asignar√°n una mesa, no puedes elegir. Puede que te toque una amplia, chida y c√≥moda o una alta con bancos altos y mesa peque√±a.

El buffet ampliado cuesta 130 por persona MAS una obligatoria bebida de al menos medio litro. En promedio el litro de bebida est√° en 80-100 pesos (Caguama, mojitos, aguas de sabor SIN alcohol, pi√±as coladas etc)
De comida hay alitas, hamburguesas, sushi (Makis), pizzas individuales y hotdogs.

As√≠ que calcula alrededor de 230 pesos por persona. (Precios de agosto 2023)

Sobre el lugar, es una tem√°tica como bar de Inglaterra digamos, the Beatles, nirvana, the doors, the strokes son bandas que dan el ambiente al lugar.
Muy rockero, pero excelente ambiente para todos, eso s√≠. Agradable a la vista :)

Sobre el servicio, tardaron 25 minutos en tomar mi orden aunque luego el mesero estuvo atento.
La comida tarda MUCHO en llegar, he ido varias veces y sin exagerar, siempre, siempreeee consideren que van a tardar unos 25 minutos o media hora en traerles la comida. Y unos 15-20 para las bebidas.
Creo que esa es la peor parte, esperar.

Recomiendo pedirte chingo de cosas desde un inicio para que te las traigan "pronto"
Ya que si pides de cosa en cosa, tardar√° tanto que se te ir√° el apetito ente comida y comida.
Sobre todo si son varias personas que comen mucho. Ya le s√©, y apenas lleg√≥ en caliente pido una hamburguesa, dos √≥rdenes de alitas, dos sushis y mi caguama.

La propina la piden diciendo "Si gusta apoyarme con el servicio", me gusta, no me siento obligado a dejarles (Aunque siempre lo hago))

Creo que describ√≠ muy bien el lugar.
Lo recomiendo bastante para ir con tu novi@, tus amigos, familia.

Arriba est√° el bar "la mojiteria", ese est√° bueno si lo que buscas es tomar antes que comer.

Recomendaciones: La bebida Blue Coconut est√° buen√≠sima, es muy dulce, cremosa. Todo puede ir con o sin alcohol, c√≥mo gusten solo pidanlo.

Siempre pidan unas alitas BQQ, son dulces y todo mundo las ama. Algunas otras como mango habanero, b√∫falo y tal pueden sonar tentadoras pero cr√©anme, son m√°s que m√°s cuesta acabarse.

Las hamburguesas tienen demasiado pan, yo les pellizco a la tapa para quitarle el exceso de pan y me entre m√°s comida.

TODO lo que dejen a medias, se les cobra aparte. As√≠ que no se levanta nadie hasta que se acabe toda la comida.
traduccion_nueva: I only went for the buffet. There is valet parking, although there are few spaces to park nearby, there are several on the corner but it is San Manuel. They will assign you a table, you cannot choose. You may get a spacious, cool and comfortable one or a tall one with high benches and a small table. The expanded buffet costs 130 per person PLUS a mandatory drink of at least half a liter. On average, a liter of drink is 80-100 pesos (Caguama, mojitos, NON-alcoholic flavored waters, pina coladas, etc.) For food, there are wings, hamburgers, sushi (Makis), individual pizzas and hotdogs. So calculate around 230 pesos per person. (Prices from August 2023) About the place, it is a theme like a bar from England, let's say, the Beatles, nirvana, the doors, the strokes are bands that give the place the atmosphere. Very rock, but excellent atmosphere for everyone, yes. Nice to look at :) Regarding the service, it took them 25 minutes to take my order although then the waiter was attentive. The food takes a LONG time to arrive, I have been several times and without exaggeration, always, always consider that it will take about 25 minutes or half an hour for the food to be brought to you. And about 15-20 for drinks. I think that's the worst part, waiting. I recommend asking for a lot of things from the beginning so that they bring them to you "soon." Because if you order one thing at a time, it will take so long that your appetite will disappear between meals. Especially if there are several people who eat a lot. I already know, and as soon as it arrived hot I ordered a hamburger, two orders of wings, two sushi and my loggerhead. They ask for the tip saying "If you like to support me with the service", I like it, I don't feel obligated to leave them (Although I always do)) I think I described the place very well. I highly recommend it to go with your boyfriend, your friends, family. Upstairs is the bar "la mojiteria", that is good if you are looking to drink before eating. Recommendations: The Blue Coconut drink is delicious, it is very sweet, creamy. Everything can go with or without alcohol, however you like, just ask for it. Always order some BQQ wings, they are sweet and everyone loves them. Some others like habanero mango, buffalo and such may sound tempting but believe me, they are more difficult to finish. The burgers have too much bread, I pinch the top to remove the excess bread and get more food in. EVERYTHING they leave halfway, they are charged separately. So no one gets up until all the food is gone.

Review: Simplemente como consejo eviten ir. Llegamos y nos tomaron la orden despu√©s de 15 minutos, no nos import√≥ debido a que vimos que estaban ocupados. Pedimos litros de bebidas y las ordenes. Vuelve con las hamburguesas, en un solo plato y nos dice enseguida les traigo platos, ese enseguida se convirti√≥ en m√°s de 10 minutos cuando ya hab√≠amos acabado de comerlas porque adem√°s estaban fr√≠as, por lo que pensamos que llevaban rato hechas pero la mesera estaba despistada. Tard√≥ otros 25 minutos en traernos otra orden y es entonces que le pregunt√© donde estaban las papas fritas que pedimos con las hamburguesas y nos que las pedir√≠as a cocina, mismas que nunca llegaron. Decidimos pedir la cuenta ( gran error no pedirla antes) la mesera tard√≥ casi media hora y fue solo tras decirle que no ten√≠amos m√°s tiempo y que llamara a su capit√°n que fue por la cuenta. Entrega la cuenta esta vez y literalmente no se despeg√≥ de nosotros esperando incluy√©ramos la propina o ‚ÄúServicio‚Äù como ellos le llaman. Al pagar en efectivo le dije que esperara el cambio y me pregunt√≥ de nuevo si cobraba el servicio de ah√≠, obviamente le dije que no. As√≠ que una vez de nuevo regres√≥ con el cambio estuvo ah√≠ esperando, solo nos fuimos. Soy una persona a favor de la cultura de propinas y me gusta hacerlo cuando el mesero es atento o m√≠nimo amable y el servicio es aceptable o lo menos que esperas ir y comer. Sin embargo el hecho de que, se molestaron por preguntar, la comida y bebidas tard√≥ excesivamente, mencionaron agregar el ‚Äúservicio‚Äù y ni siquiera expresaron que porcentaje. Porque seamos claros, servicio no hubo, y con tan poco personal, que seguramente es la raz√≥n de que muchas rese√±as concuerdan en lo mismo, el lugar ha de pagarles un buen salario para no tener que contratar mas personal y en verdad ofrecer ‚Äúservicio‚Äù
traduccion_nueva: Just as advice, avoid going. We arrived and they took our order after 15 minutes, we didn't mind because we saw they were busy. We ordered liters of drinks and placed our orders. All started here. It took more than 30 minutes to bring us our drinks. And then we asked the waitress about the food and she said she would take care of it and bring it right away, so we ordered more with the expectation that we wouldn't have to wait so long between orders and she denied us that option. Finally we saw the waitress bring orders from other tables that had arrived at the same time or shortly after us and we asked her again, that's when she told us, I'll be right back. He comes back with the hamburgers, on a single plate and tells us I'll bring you plates right away, that immediately turned into more than 10 minutes when we had already finished eating them because they were also cold, so we thought they had been done for a while but the waitress was clueless . It took him another 25 minutes to bring us another order and that's when I asked him where the fries were that we ordered with the hamburgers and told us that you would ask the kitchen for them, which never arrived. After almost two hours and few customers, many left. We decided to ask for the bill (big mistake not asking for it before) the waitress took almost half an hour and it was only after telling her that we didn't have more time and to call her captain who went for the bill. He handed over the bill this time and literally stood by us waiting for us to include the tip or ‚ÄúService‚Äù as they call it. When paying in cash I told him to wait for the change and he asked me again if I charged for the service there, obviously I told him no. So once he came back with the change he was there waiting, we just left. I'm a pro-tipping culture person and I like to do it when the waiter is attentive or minimally friendly and the service is acceptable or the least you expect to go and eat. However, the fact that, they bothered to ask, the food and drinks took excessively long, they mentioned adding the ‚Äúservice‚Äù and did not even express what percentage. Because let's be clear, there was no service, and with so little staff, which is surely the reason why many reviews agree on the same thing, the place has to pay them a good salary so as not to have to hire more staff and actually offer ‚Äúservice.‚Äù
